metadata.title: CVE-2021-47055 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mtd:require write permissions for locking and badblock ioctls MEMLOCK,MEMUNLOCK and OTPLOCK modify protection bits. Thus require writepermission. Depending on the hardware MEMLOCK might even be write-once,e.g. for SPI-NOR flashes with their WP# tied to GND. OTPLOCK is alwayswrite-once. MEMSETBADBLOCK modifies the bad block table.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47055` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-151-generic - 4.15.0-151.157
linux-image-4.15.0-151-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-151.157
linux-image-4.15.0-151-lowlatency - 4.15.0-151.157
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-151-generic - 4.15.0-151.157
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-151-lowlatency - 4.15.0-151.157
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-77-generic - 5.4.0-77.86~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-77-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-77.86~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-77-lowlatency - 5.4.0-77.86~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-77-generic - 5.4.0-77.86~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-77-lowlatency - 5.4.0-77.86~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1097-kvm - 4.15.0-1097.99
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1109-aws - 4.15.0-1109.116
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1051-aws - 5.4.0-1051.53~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1121-azure - 4.15.0-1121.134
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-151.157').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-77.86~18.04.1').
linux-kvm package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1097.99').
linux-aws package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1109.116').

linux-oracle-5.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1048.52~18.04.1').
